## gitlabctl gendoc

Generate markdown documentation

### Synopsis

Generate markdown documentation

```
gitlabctl gendoc [flags]
```

### Options

```
      --dir string   The directory path where the documentations will be placed. (default "docs")
  -h, --help         help for gendoc
```
